page.title: 20Grampound Rd & Ladock Future
page.content: At Grampound Road ten people were asked what amenities they would like in the village. They wanted a Doctor's Surgery, bank, swimming pool, Aero park, more buses and improvements to the shops. Half wanted the village to stay the same while the rest wanted to see change. The children of Ladock School like living in a rural area because it is quiet, clean and open. When asked what amenities they would like in the village they wanted a fish and chip shop, swimming pool, tennis court, roller skate park and a riding school. However, they concluded that, with all these things, Ladock would no longer be a country village and so they wouldn't enjoy living here anymore! Having said that, the existing amenities are threatened with closure unless there is some development.
